Tools Docs Community About Code
  • No installation needed, runs in a web browser
  • Data stored in browser cache
  • Import/Export from/to local filesystem
  • Manage multiple records and relationships
  • Built-in validation and error reporting
  • Re-usable components
    • metadata records
    • contacts (person or group)
    • data dictionaries
  • Integration with mdTranslator web service
  • Publish to external catalogs
  • Import extents (shapefile, kml, csv, more...)
  • Create custom content Profiles
